name: The Bad Word (Gin Cocktail With Lime, Chartreuse, and Gran Classico)
description: A gin cocktail that's fresh and tart, with an herbal backbone and a bracing, bitter edge.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce (20ml) fresh juice from 1 to 2 limes

recipeInstructions.text: Add lime, Green Chartreuse, Gran Classico, and gin to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 12 seconds, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
